mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.photo_name, s.photo_src, DATE_FORMAT(s.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time, s.shop_id t.id AS tag_id, t.tag_name FROM tb_photo as s JOIN tb_photoOrImg_tag as d ON s.id = d.itemOrImg_id JOIN tb_tag as t ON t.id = d.tag_id WHERE s.id = #{photoId} and d.tag_type = 'photo'
